SELECT q.questionnaire_id AS questionnaireId, q.questionnaire_title AS questionnaireTitle, q.questionnaire_subtitle AS questionnaireSubtitle, q.questionnaire_description AS questionnaireDescription, q.create_time AS templateDate FROM questionnaire AS q
AND q.create_user = #{userTel}
AND q.is_template = TRUE AND q.is_share = FALSE AND q.is_visible = TRUE AND q.is_done = TRUE AND q.is_delete = FALSE
ORDER BY q.create_time DESC
